languages.text: "У меня как раз готова была поставка отличнейших, уникальных имплантов высочайшего качества. Но я был неосторожен! Отлучился в свой первый за четыре стандартных года отгул по болезни! И ровно в этот день господин Беллардо скончался, и его родня поспешила организовать церемонию в нашем крематории... я просто не успел ничего предпринять. Контейнер с моим товаром — он лежит в топке, и если вы не поможете мне — его вот-вот сожгут!"

traits.locale_text: "У меня как раз готова была поставка отличнейших, уникальных имплантов высочайшего качества. Но я был неосторожен! Отлучился в свой первый за четыре стандартных года отгул! И ровно в этот день господин Беллардо скончался, и его родня поспешила организовать церемонию в нашем крематории... я просто не успел ничего предпринять. Контейнер с моим товаром — он лежит в топке, и если вы не поможете мне — его вот-вот сожгут!"

languages.text: "I had just prepared the newest batch of superb, unique implants of the highest quality. But I got careless! I used my first sick leave in four standard years! And it was on that very day that Master Bellardo passed away, and his family was quick to organise a ceremony in our crematorium... I simply didn't have time to prepare. And now my container full of goods — it's in the furnace, and if you don't help me, they're going to burn it any minute!"
languages.original_text: "У меня как раз готова была поставка отличнейших, уникальных имплантов высочайшего качества. Но я был неосторожен! Отлучился в свой первый за четыре стандартных года отгул по болезни! И ровно в этот день господин Беллардо скончался, и его родня поспешила организовать церемонию в нашем крематории... я просто не успел ничего предпринять. Контейнер с моим товаром — он лежит в топке, и если вы не поможете мне — его вот-вот сожгут!"

And it was at that very day that Master Bellardo passed away, and his family was quick to organize a ceremony in our crematorium... I simply didn't have time to prepare. And now my container full of goods — it's in the furnace, and if you don't help me, they're going to burn it any minute!"

"I had just prepared the newest batch of superb, unique implants of the highest quality. But I got careless! I used my first sick leave in four standard years! And it was on that very day that Master Bellardo passed away, and his family was quick to organise a ceremony in our crematorium... I simply didn't have time to prepare. And now my container full of goods — it's in the furnace, and if you don't help me, they're going to burn it any minute!"

languages.text: “不久前，我刚刚准备了最新一批独一无二的顶级植入物，可我太大意了！我请了我这四个标准年来的唯一一次病假！而就在我请假那天，贝拉多大师去世了，他的家人很快就在我们的火葬场做好了葬礼准备……我根本没时间去做手脚。而现在，我装着货的箱子都藏在那个炉子里。如果您不帮我这个忙的话，那些东西随时都可能会被烧掉！”
languages.original_text: "I had just prepared the newest batch of superb, unique implants of the highest quality. But I got careless! I used my first sick leave in four standard years! And it was on that very day that Master Bellardo passed away, and his family was quick to organise a ceremony in our crematorium... I simply didn't have time to prepare. And now my container full of goods — it's in the furnace, and if you don't help me, they're going to burn it any minute!"

traits.locale_text: “不久前，我刚刚准备了最新一批独一无二的顶级植入物，可我太大意了！我请了我这四个标准年来的唯一一次病假！而就在我请假那天，贝拉多大师去世了，他的家人很快就在我们的火葬场做好了葬礼准备……我根本没时间去做手脚。而现在，我装着货的箱子都藏在那个炉子里。如果您不帮我这个忙的话，那些东西随时都可能会被烧掉！”

languages.text: «Acababa de preparar una remesa de excelentes implantes de la mayor calidad, ¡pero me descuidé! ¡Usé el primer día de permiso por enfermedad de los últimos cuatro años! Y justo ese día murió el señor Bellardo. Su familia organizó la ceremonia en nuestro crematorio muy rápidamente... y no tuve tiempo de prepararme. Y ahora el contenedor de mis bienes está en el horno, ¡y si no me ayuda lo quemarán en cualquier momento!».
languages.original_text: "I had just prepared the newest batch of superb, unique implants of the highest quality. But I got careless! I used my first sick leave in four standard years! And it was on that very day that Master Bellardo passed away, and his family was quick to organise a ceremony in our crematorium... I simply didn't have time to prepare. And now my container full of goods — it's in the furnace, and if you don't help me, they're going to burn it any minute!"

traits.locale_text: «Acababa de preparar una remesa de excelentes implantes de la mayor calidad, ¡pero me descuidé! ¡Usé el primer día de permiso por enfermedad de los últimos cuatro años! Y justo ese día murió el señor Bellardo. Su familia organizó la ceremonia en nuestro crematorio muy rápidamente... y no tuve tiempo de prepararme. Y ahora el contenedor de mis bienes está en el horno, ¡y si no me ayuda lo quemarán en cualquier momento!».

languages.text: 「ちょうど最高級のユニークなインプラントを新たに手配したところなんですが、愚かにも油断していました！4年ぶりに病気休暇をとってしまった日にマスター・ベラルドがお亡くなりになり、ご遺族が火葬場で式をされることになったのですが…どうにかするための時間がありませんでした。そのせいで今、商品まみれのコンテナが…炉の中に入っているんです。あなたが手を貸してくれなければ、まもなくすべて燃やされてしまいかねません！」
languages.original_text: "I had just prepared the newest batch of superb, unique implants of the highest quality. But I got careless! I used my first sick leave in four standard years! And it was on that very day that Master Bellardo passed away, and his family was quick to organise a ceremony in our crematorium... I simply didn't have time to prepare. And now my container full of goods — it's in the furnace, and if you don't help me, they're going to burn it any minute!"

traits.locale_text: 「ちょうど最高級のユニークなインプラントを新たに手配したところなんですが、愚かにも油断していました！4年ぶりに病気休暇をとってしまった日にマスター・ベラルドがお亡くなりになり、ご遺族が火葬場で式をされることになったのですが…どうにかするための時間がありませんでした。そのせいで今、商品まみれのコンテナが…炉の中に入っているんです。あなたが手を貸してくれなければ、まもなくすべて燃やされてしまいかねません！」

languages.text: "Ich hatte gerade einige erstklassige, einzigartige Implantate höchster Qualität zu einem neuen Paket zusammengestellt. Aber ich wurde unvorsichtig! Ich habe mich zum ersten Mal in vier Standardjahren krank gemeldet. Und genau an diesem Tag ist Meister Bellardo verstorben, und seine Familie hat umgehend eine Zeremonie in unserem Krematorium veranlasst ... Ich hatte schlichtweg keine Zeit zur Vorbereitung. Und jetzt liegt mein Container mit Ware im Ofen, und wenn Ihr mir nicht helft, werden sie ihn jede Minute verbrennen!"
languages.original_text: "I had just prepared the newest batch of superb, unique implants of the highest quality. But I got careless! I used my first sick leave in four standard years! And it was on that very day that Master Bellardo passed away, and his family was quick to organise a ceremony in our crematorium... I simply didn't have time to prepare. And now my container full of goods — it's in the furnace, and if you don't help me, they're going to burn it any minute!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich hatte gerade einige erstklassige, einzigartige Implantate höchster Qualität zu einem neuen Paket zusammengestellt. Aber ich wurde unvorsichtig! Ich habe mich zum ersten Mal in vier Standardjahren krank gemeldet. Und genau an diesem Tag ist Meister Bellardo verstorben, und seine Familie hat umgehend eine Zeremonie in unserem Krematorium veranlasst ... Ich hatte schlichtweg keine Zeit zur Vorbereitung. Und jetzt liegt mein Container mit Ware im Ofen, und wenn Ihr mir nicht helft, werden sie ihn jede Minute verbrennen!"

languages.text: « Je venais d'ailleurs de finir de préparer une nouvelle cargaison d'implants uniques de qualité supérieure quand j'ai fait une grossière erreur ! J'ai posé mon premier arrêt maladie depuis quatre ans standard... et c'est ce même jour que maître Bellardo a choisi pour mourir. Bien sûr, sa famille s'est empressée d'organiser la cérémonie dans notre crématorium... Je n'ai absolument pas eu le temps de me préparer. Mon conteneur est rempli à ras bord de marchandises... mais il est dans le four ! Si vous ne m'aidez pas, et vite, tout va partir en fumée ! »
languages.original_text: "I had just prepared the newest batch of superb, unique implants of the highest quality. But I got careless! I used my first sick leave in four standard years! And it was on that very day that Master Bellardo passed away, and his family was quick to organise a ceremony in our crematorium... I simply didn't have time to prepare. And now my container full of goods — it's in the furnace, and if you don't help me, they're going to burn it any minute!"

traits.locale_text: « Je venais d'ailleurs de finir de préparer une nouvelle cargaison d'implants uniques de qualité supérieure quand j'ai fait une grossière erreur ! J'ai posé mon premier arrêt maladie depuis quatre ans standard... et c'est ce même jour que maître Bellardo a choisi pour mourir. Bien sûr, sa famille s'est empressée d'organiser la cérémonie dans notre crématorium... Je n'ai absolument pas eu le temps de me préparer. Mon conteneur est rempli à ras bord de marchandises... mais il est dans le four ! Si vous ne m'aidez pas, et vite, tout va partir en fumée ! »

languages.text: "Eşsiz ve en üst kalite implantlardan oluşan en son partiyi daha yeni hazırlamıştım ama dikkatsizlik ettim! Dört standart yıldan sonra ilk kez hastalık izni kullandım ama Üstat Bellardo'nun vefat edeceği tuttu! Ailesi de bir anda bizim krematoryumda tören düzenlemeye karar verdi. Hazırlanacak vaktim olmadı. Şu an zulam mal dolu ama merhumun gireceği fırının içinde. Bana yardım etmezseniz her an küle dönebilir!"
languages.original_text: "I had just prepared the newest batch of superb, unique implants of the highest quality. But I got careless! I used my first sick leave in four standard years! And it was on that very day that Master Bellardo passed away, and his family was quick to organise a ceremony in our crematorium... I simply didn't have time to prepare. And now my container full of goods — it's in the furnace, and if you don't help me, they're going to burn it any minute!"

traits.locale_text: "Eşsiz ve son kalite implantlardan oluşan en son partiyi daha yeni hazırlamıştım ama dikkatsizlik ettim! Dört standart yıldır kullanmadığım ilk hastalık iznimi kullanmaya karar verdim! Hem de Üstat Bellardo'nun vefat ettiği gün! Ailesi bir anda bizim krematoryumumuzda tören düzenlemeye karar verdi. Hazırlanacak vaktim olmadı yani... Sonuç olarak kutum mal dolu, üstüne bir de fırının içinde. Bana yardım etmezseniz her an ateşi yakabilirler!"
